system.description:
Your patron has granted you a sliver of their power to keep you out of harm's way.

You are considered under the protection of a specific version of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.fujxumfdi1t6zh9p]{Contingency} spell. You don't need to provide the material components for either the contingency spell or the spell cast by contingency.

After a long rest, you can set the trigger of the contingency (and inform your Narrator). When you do so, you cannot change the trigger until you finish 1d4 long rests.

The contingency spell protecting you can only cast one of the following spells at 5th level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.f0lq2ogke9k8f1v9]{Mislead}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.0cdtrkihoe9jdon1]{Greater Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.6y4rq48okutkormg]{Phantasmal Killer} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.pdvg7c9emjgnib07]{Confusion}.

You don't need to know the spell for it to be cast as part of contingency's effect. You can choose which spell is cast when contingency triggers.

Once contingency has been triggered, this feature cannot be used again before you finish 2d4 long rests.
system.prerequisite: Level 14 Warlock Agent of the Magus
